page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: Our area is mostly fields and farmland The area is hilly and cut with valleys running from the North East to the South East.The main valley is the River Amber which runs diagonally to the south end of our area.On the South end of our area there is a Flourspar Prossesing Plan on the White Hillocks in Overton.In Ashover there are three kinds of stone,Alluvium,Toadstone and Carboniferous Limestone Series{(Dinant {_ion _Cawdor Group).}There are four different rivers,the River Amber,Marsh Brook,Smally Brook and Hodgelane Brook ,there is also Press Reservoir.There are lots of stone walls around Ashover mostly made out of Lime Stone and Sand Stone;some stone walls have fossils in them.Ashover Rock is made out of gritstone.The houses are mostly made out of limestone.The limestone was probably from the local Butts Quarry.
